schema_description: Picking data for manual picking from a new GCP data source which is a backend of TO Mobile. Each client will switch data sources on their own time, so there could be a time when some clients are using Pickerman and others are using TO Mobile

fields.description: Client name.
fields.name: __client_name

fields.description: Source name.
fields.name: __source_name

fields.description: Schema version.
fields.name: __schema_version

fields.description: Event timestamp.
fields.name: __event_timestamp

fields.description: Source system Pub/Sub message id (use in case of pubsub2pubsub pattern)
fields.name: pubsub_message_id

fields.description: Version of the Takeoff Mobile App instance which generated the action
fields.name: appVersion

fields.description: Environment type: dev, qai, uat, or prod
fields.name: environmentTypeId

fields.description: Code name of the event that created/altered order fulfillment like fulfillment.picking.itemPicked
fields.name: type

fields.description: The ID of the order ID associated with the action
fields.name: orderId

fields.description: Reserved for future use; currently always 0
fields.name: orderPartId

fields.description: Intermediate count of the bags. This action is sent by the app every time the user changes the bag count during picking
fields.name: bagCount

fields.description: Number of labels printed by the user
fields.name: count

fields.description: Count of the totes. The count of the totes and the label array length will be the same if there are no issues
fields.name: totesCount
labels
fields.description: Array of the labels represented as ZPL strings
Retailer codename, e.g. alpha
fields.name: retailerId

fields.description: Firebase registered email of the user that created this action
fields.name: email

fields.description: Firebase UID of the user that created this action
fields.name: userId
user
fields.description: Identification data of the user that created the event
Reserved for future use; currently always 0
fields.name: workTaskId

fields.description: Unique identifier for the task action. It is composed of a random UUID concatenated with the orderID
fields.name: id

fields.description: Number representing the ordering of this step in the pick path. A 'step' is a product + address combination. The order of the steps is the same as in Pickerman Facadeâ€™s asynchronous assignment response (/api/v1/queue/<mfcId>/orders/assign-async
fields.name: stepNumber

fields.description: MAC address of the device. Android controls access to the MAC address of the device via user permission; if this permission is not set, or the OS restricts this information for any reason, this field will contain the string takeoff-mobile
fields.name: deviceId

fields.description: Timestamp when the task action was created at the device. It is useful to understand the potential delays in the message
fields.name: deviceTimestamp

fields.description: ID (TOM code) of the MFC. This value  is retrieved from the Service Catalog API
fields.name: mfcId

fields.description: Total number of units requested for this task
fields.name: totalRequested

fields.description: Total number of units picked for this task
fields.name: totalPicked

fields.description: Count of the fulfillment.picking.itemPicked actions that were created for the fulfillment task
fields.name: totalPickingActions
pick
fields.description: Record of order fulfillment picking details that represents an individual item pick. An item in this context corresponds to each of the rows of the picking screen table

fields.name: addressId
fields.description: Shelf address where this product was picked from

fields.name: productId
fields.description: The identifier of item in takeoff system

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The picked quantity of the item

fields.name: barcodes
fields.description: List of picked barcodes as they were scanned (output) by barcode scanner of picking device

fields.name: stepNumber
fields.description: Number representing the ordering of this step in the pick path. A 'step' is a product + address combination

fields.name: toteId
fields.description: ID of the tote into which the product was picked

fields.name: weight
fields.description: When variable weight applies, this will contain the weight of the item in the unit of measure described in the product catalog
An array of the IDs of the totes that were collected/staged
fields.name: toteBarcodes

fields.description: This variable signals that the pick was of type variable measure. Note that we are sending this flag only if true, therefore itâ€™s absence (rather than the value false) will represent the opposite condition
fields.name: isVariableMeasure

fields.description: For variable measure picks only:  type of variable measure, weight or price. This is set by: NORMALIZATION_IS_WEIGHT variable in TSC config
fields.name: variableMeasureType

fields.description: Describes that this was picked with aggregated weight (multiple items and a single weight represented).
fields.name: isAggregatedWeight

fields.description: Timestamp when message was published to topic.
fields.name: pubsub_publish_time

fields.description: Message attributes.
fields.name: attributes
